jobDescription: Sourcing, Screening and Submitting Quality resumes as per the client's requirement. Expert level experience in Recruiting Citizens, Green Cards, EADs, H1B and TN Visa Holders on all the tax term (W2, 1099 & Crop to Crop) Existing and proven relationships with vendors focusing on niche IT areas. 3-5 years of experience in recruiting consultants, ideally on IT technologies. Excellent analytical skills and good communication skills.  Experience in negotiating compensation to close a candidate. Should be an individual contributor and a Team Player. Building good rapport with management and the team. Handling of complete recruitment cycle starting from screening to closure. Pre-screening candidates to check their interest, confidence, communication skills.
